replies.body:
...

MARIO OP NO SKILL NOOBCHAMP RITO NERF PLZ-a bronze,

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cGEJizRg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-26T16:20:10.615+0000)
>
> what is pic #2 from?

That's Megumin from Konosuba, a fantastic comedic parody of the "random loser gets sent to a fantasy world" anime trope. She's known for using explosion magic, the most powerful type of magic in the Konosuba fantasy world. I highly recommend watching it if you can.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/O4tbOvKwZUw/maxresdefault.jpg

http://skythewoodtl.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/kono_subarashii_sekai_ni_shukufuku_wo-02-megumin-arch_wizard-crimson_mazoku-red_eyes-eyepatch-lens_flare-light-color-style.jpg
